name: NSWindow.UserTabbingPreference
desc: A value that indicates the user’s preference for window tabbing.

items.name: case always
items.desc: A value that indicates a window should always display as tabs.

items.name: case inFullScreen
items.desc: A value that indicates a window should only display as tabs when in full-screen mode.

items.name: case manual
items.desc: A value that indicates a window should display as tabs according to the window’s tabbing mode.
